dataset_metrics_flink.alias: [DATASET]: Detected high rate of invalid data than expected
dataset_metrics_flink.description: The dataset is unhealthy, and the query results may be incorrect
dataset_metrics_flink.summary: Invalid data has been ingested in the system, preventing it from being processed. Henceforth, queries on this dataset may not return accurate data.

dataset_metrics_flink.alias: [DATASET]: Detected higher rate of duplicate data than expected
dataset_metrics_flink.description: The dataset is unhealthy, and the query results may be incorrect
dataset_metrics_flink.summary: Duplicate data has been ingested in the system, preventing it from being processed. Henceforth, queries on this dataset may not return accurate data.

dataset_metrics_flink.alias: [DATASET]: Detected higher incidence of failures during data enrichment.
dataset_metrics_flink.description: The dataset is unhealthy, and the query results may be incorrect
dataset_metrics_flink.summary: The data ingested into the system is failing the enrichment process, which may cause queries on this dataset to return inaccurate data.

dataset_metrics_flink.alias: [DATASET]: Detected higher incidence of failures during data transformations.
dataset_metrics_flink.description: The dataset is unhealthy, and the query results may be incorrect
dataset_metrics_flink.summary: The data ingested into the system is failing the data transformation process, which may cause queries on this dataset to return inaccurate data.

dataset_metrics_flink.alias: [DATASET]: No data has been received for the past hour.
dataset_metrics_flink.description: The dataset hasn’t received any new data for the past hour, which may affect the querying of the new data.
dataset_metrics_flink.summary: The dataset has not received any new data, which will impact real-time data processing

dataset_metrics_druid.alias: [DATASET]: Druid supervisor is in an unhealthy state
dataset_metrics_druid.description: The dataset is unhealthy, and no new data has been available for querying since the system encountered the issue.
dataset_metrics_druid.summary: The associated Druid Supervisor is in an unhealthy state, preventing druid ingestion tasks from running. As a result, real-time data cannot be queried.

dataset_metrics_druid.alias: [DATASET]: Detected higher amount of unparseable data.
dataset_metrics_druid.description: The dataset is unhealthy, and the query results may be incorrect
dataset_metrics_druid.summary: Unparseable data has been detected in the system, preventing it from being processed. Henceforth, queries on this dataset may not return accurate data until the issue is resolved.

dataset_metrics_druid.alias: [DATASET]: Detected higher amount of query lag than expected.
dataset_metrics_druid.description: A large amount of data is still waiting to be processed. This may cause delays in querying the most recent data
dataset_metrics_druid.summary: High indexer lag in the dataset indicates processing of new data is delayed. Because of this delay, new data isn’t available when querying the dataset.

dataset_metrics_druid.alias: [DATASET]: Druid Supervisor Ingestion Failure Due to Offsets.
dataset_metrics_druid.description: The dataset is unhealthy, and no new data has been available for querying since the issue occurred
dataset_metrics_druid.summary: The supervisor is experiencing a negative offset, preventing it from ingesting new data. As a result, real-time data is unavailable for querying.

api_metric.alias: [DATASET]: The Data Query API is encountering more failures to retrieve the data
api_metric.description: The dataset has been unavailable for querying data for an extented period
api_metric.summary: Query failures are preventing access to the dataset, resulting in an inability to retrieve data as expected.

api_metric.alias: [DATASET]: The Data Query API is facing delays in retrieving data
api_metric.description: There is a delay in querying the dataset for an extended period.
api_metric.summary: Delays in queries are affecting access to the dataset, leading to delayed data retrieval.

api_metric.alias: [DATASET]: Failed to ingest data into the system
api_metric.description: Detected failures while adding new data to the dataset.
api_metric.summary: Failed to add new data to the dataset, impacting real-time data availability.
